Reason.need: I'd like to install solar panels on my house and want to know if I need permission to have someone undertake this work.

Reason.next_actions: The resident could follow the provided links to learn more about permitted development and check if installing solar panels falls under this category. analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides some useful information and resources for council residents seeking guidance on permitted development, but lacks specific details regarding solar panel installations. Key gaps include direct answers to the question and specific advice related to solar panels in relation to permitted development.
